articles.author: Igor Bonifacic
articles.description:
On Friday, a federal court sentenced Joseph James O’Conner
 to five years in prison for his involvement in the 2020 Twitter hack
. Last month, the 24-year-old, known as PlugwalkJoe online, plead guilty
 to a host of cyber crimes, including carrying out a S…
